name: Deep Trouble (Game Jam)
description: Discover what's under this old house and see if you can make it out alive. I focused mainly on environments and playing around with animated wall textures.  Unfortunately the art is not done. I had to take a few days off during the jam and didn't complete everything I would like to. Only one custom enemy made it into the game and no custom art for weapons.  Hopefully it's still interesting, I plan to put up a more complete version.
